top_themes.name: EU-LAC Digital Alliance
top_themes.justification: The EU-LAC Digital Alliance is central to the document's main message, emphasizing the importance of digital cooperation between Europe and Latin America. It aligns with key objectives of enhancing connectivity and fostering sustainable development in the region.
